Factsheet

Developer:
Diego Giacomelli
Based in Porto Alegre - Brazil
Release date:
Platforms:
Windows
Website:
diegogiacomelli.com.br/games/atena
Regular Price:
Free

Description

A shoot 'em up game made in 2001 with C++ and Allegro.

History

2001

In 2001 Edison Henrique Andreassy, Diego Giacomelli (me), Giusepe Casagrande and Wanderson Pereira team upped to develop a shoot 'em up game using greek mythology as thematic.

Features

  • Bullet hell
  • Great graphics
